item.title: Steve Rosenberg: Putin showing no signs of compromise
item.description: The BBC's Russia Editor shares his analysis after five hours of peace talks between the Russians and the US.

item.title: Was it a coup or was it a 'sham'? Behind Guinea-Bissau's military takeover
item.description: The military has taken over but some say the overthrow of the president was not what it seemed.

item.title: India scraps order to pre-install state-run cyber safety app on smartphones
item.description: The order to make the registration mandatory had led to a major backlash from several cyber experts.

item.title: Trump says he does not want Somalis in US as ICE plans Minnesota operation
item.description: The president says the US will "go the wrong way if we keep taking in garbage into our country".

item.title: Australia is banning social media for kids under 16. How will it work?
item.description: The world-first law aims to reduce the risks children face online, but critics fear it may not work.
